translated: Leonard Eugene Dickson is an American mathematician who was born in 1874 in the state of Iowa, in the United States and died in 1954 in Texas, the US.
original: Leonard Eugene Dickson est un mathématicien américain né en 1874 dans l'état de l'Iowa, aux Etats-Unis, et mort en 1954 dans le Texas, aux Etats-Unis.
